title: 8 BOTS in this Game, and I got a free rotation champ, screw you riot... again... Sort your crap out
body:
I know a bunch of ranked snobs will say "it's just ARAM" but I can't stand fighting over who has what lane in SR so I play ARAM 99% of the time, so ARAM is my game of choice even if you think it's just a "fun mode" (which is why I game... fun...), and now I've got to deal with these BOTs AGAIN, sort your crap out RIOT. It's SO OBVIOUS in the loading screen who are bots, are your devs just dullards or don't they care? Seriously... There are so many posts about bots, yet the only replies to this post I'll get, if any, is ppl saying "it's just aram" or "If I phrased my post nicer Riot may pay attention" etc and there will be no change from Riot...

Here's an ARAM I just played with 8 bots, so 1v1 (vs Cassiopia), and I got a free rotation champ that I have no idea how to play, what a waste of 22 mins.

replies.body:
That's really annoying and starting to get out of hand since I used to be able to play a lot of aram games with no bots on a lvl 30 and only see bots on a low level account.

Seems like there's more and more of them now.

Make sure to report the bots so riot gets alerted so the newer bots don't survive for too long.

So I tried a game of normal draft, got the position I wanted, selected my champ, got to what I thought was a ban screen on the second screen with my champ still selected, when the countdown finished I got dropped back to the menu with a 6 min block for dodging a game... WTH???
 Apparently I've got to watch youtube just to select a champ to play a SR draft game.. That's a fail on intuitiveness if you ask me.
its basically ranked but without the rank system so a draft pick with bans.

Yeah, alg, got it now, would be better if you didn't * have to * ban, for draft noobs like myself :P
Another A for Sona... she's so hard to get an S on in SR...

Oh, and I haven't played ranked.. considered it many times, but I don't like the pressure lol
...watches youtube... so you *have to* ban a champ else you have dodged... riigghht...
Yeah, pleased they've introduced a trial of this, hope it stays around.

I only play ARAM and I never see bots...

Must be the nearly 7000 games of ARAM under my belt...
Dude I also once had a game with 8 bots and me and my team mate weren't bots, so we proceeded to get 2 pentas each and an ez S+ XD. But I feel ur pain bots ruin games.
